hero.name: Francisco!

hero.description1: I specialize in MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js, creating modern and efficient applications that make a difference.
hero.description2: I also help companies automate processes with AI, implementing intelligent solutions with n8n, chatbots, and custom agents.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey developing innovative web solutions

fullstack.title: Full Stack MERN Developer
responsibilities: Development of modern web applications using MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js.
Implementation of RESTful APIs and backend performance optimization.
Collaboration with clients to design and develop custom solutions.
Integration of external services and third-party APIs to expand functionalities.
achievements: 40% reduction in loading time through optimizations

aiConsultant.title: Artificial Intelligence Consultant
responsibilities: Advising companies on implementing AI solutions to optimize processes.
Development of complex automations using n8n for business workflows.
Creation of intelligent chatbots and custom AI agents for customer service.
Integration of AI models (GPT, Claude, etc.) into existing applications.
achievements: Implementation of 10+ bots and AI agents

wordpress.title: WordPress Developer
responsibilities: Creation and customization of WordPress websites with Elementor and other plugins.
Speed and SEO optimization to improve web performance.
Maintenance and technical support for clients.
Migration and updating of existing websites.
achievements: SEO improvement resulting in +60% organic traffic

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my most recent and challenging work

mozaik.description: A modern and dynamic website developed in React, with Google Sheets integration for real-time menu management. The Google Sheets API allows owners to easily update products without technical knowledge.

maj.description: Corporate website developed with React and custom backend. Includes integration with Google Analytics, tracking pixels, and metrics dashboard for performance analysis and real-time data visualization.

electroclau.description: Corporate website developed from scratch for an electrical sector company. Modern and responsive design that presents services, contact information, and portfolio of completed work clearly and professionally.

ecommerce.description: Developed in React, this project is a test online store with features like navigation, filters, and purchase flow. It helped me improve my React and frontend skills.

llauretum.description: It is a website that I currently manage and maintain, ensuring its proper functioning and periodic updates. I handle its administration, optimization, and customization.
